dimension: 37 x 48 in. (93.98 x 121.92 cm) (cuff to cuff)
title: Jacket
description: brown silk damask with 6\" longer front; open front with rows of blue, green, pink and white floral embroidery and applique on neck, front opening, yoke and sleeves; side opening on left has armhole with similar rows of embroidery with striped appliques which continue along hem in front and part way in back; blue lining
